text: @NYGovCuomo Hey....so you have been doing a REALLY GOOD JOB with COVID19. Thank you. However, taking Sanders off of the ballot in June will seriously fuck us all in November. We deserve to have our delegates there.  Please don't crush democracy further than it already has been. #NotMeUs
